scripts.deploy: echo "Error: Please specify environment with 'deploy:staging' or 'deploy:production'" && exit 1
scripts.deploy:staging: pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter auth deploy -- --env staging && pnpm --filter images deploy -- --env staging && pnpm --filter admin build && pnpm --filter admin deploy -- --env staging
scripts.deploy:production: pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter auth deploy -- --env production && pnpm --filter images deploy -- --env production && pnpm --filter admin build && pnpm --filter admin deploy -- --env production
